analysis.key_quote: The continuity of the day-to-day operations of our federal government and the services and protections it provides to US citizens is dependent on a consistent workforce of career, non-partisan civil servants who maintain their roles through changes in which party is in power.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a non-partisan civil service and the risks of politicization, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and employee rights.
